Get ESPN WNBA game rosters

Source: R/espn_wnba_data.R
espn_wnba_game_rosters.Rd

Get ESPN WNBA game rosters

Usage

espn_wnba_game_rosters(game_id)

Arguments

game_id

Game ID

Value

A game rosters data frame

Author

Saiem Gilani

Examples

# \donttest{
  try(espn_wnba_game_rosters(game_id = 401244185))
#> ── ESPN WNBA Game Roster Information from ESPN.com ───────────── wehoop 1.8.0 ──
